channel.title: Portfolios on Anthony Dellavecchia | Software Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Anthony Dellavecchia | Software Developer

item.title: This Website
item.description: This site is created with Hugo, a popular open-source static site generator. Hugo is built with Go lang. I wanted to create this site quickly, so I used a pre-built theme called Portio, however I did want to customize it. Therefore, I forked that project and used it as a Git submodule to my source code. I also created a seperate repository to house only the generated static files and deploy the site using GitHub Pages.

item.title: Automated Job Search
item.description: I wanted to be alerted of new job postings, so I created this script. The source code can be found on GitHub and an article/blog post with instructions on how to build it is found here.
